text: {| |} SS British Sergeant was a British tanker built by Palmers Shipbuilding and Iron Company in 1922 and operated by the British Tanker Company. She was sunk during World War II on 9 April 1942 during the Indian Ocean raid, off Batticaloa, Ceylon, by Imperial Japanese Navy aircraft. == Footnotes == ==References== * Category:World War II merchant ships of the United Kingdom Category:World War II shipwrecks in the Indian Ocean Category:Maritime incidents in April 1942 Category:Ships sunk by Japanese aircraft Category:1922 ships Category:Ships built on the River Tyne
